activities: Finalsite receives personal data from business partners (the Partners) based in the EU/EEA in the context of the hosting and operation by Finalsite of the Partners’ websites, which may include such personal data. Such personal data will be stored and processed exclusively to perform the services requested by Partners, and no further use or transmittal to third parties will be made thereof, except as required by law.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
